sentences.english: Inkstone is one of the four treasures, with deep cultural connotation .
sentences.chinese: 硯是文房四寶之一，有着深厚的文化內涵。

sentences.english: Because of its solid texture inkstone can be handed down from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 因爲堅固的硯可以從古代流傳下來。

sentences.english: Solid texture inkstone can be handed down from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 堅固的硯可以從古代流傳下來。

sentences.english: Eg. I met up with an old classmate in the holiday crowd.
sentences.chinese: 在節的羣中央，我無意偶爾遇見一個老同硯。

sentences.english: Inkstone is essential to Chinese calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 硯是中國書法的必備用具。

sentences.english: Inkstone material production in what place?
The use of winter, mainly is the ground of ink.
Note the mend the primary color with winter there is a big difference.
sentences.chinese: 注意補過的地方顏色與硯的原色有很大的差異。
